title: ineedhelptorecovermyaccount
body:
can you guys (AKA rito) help recover my account
it says it was peminitly suspended
help me please

replies.body: I agree with CrazFight that[ submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) is your best bet.  We prefer not to discuss sensitive account material on here, but player support will be able to help with your specific issue in that ticket.  Thanks for your patience!

Sending in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) is your best bet. ^_^ best of luck.

Also one of the Guidelines is "DO NOT post content regarding account suspensions here. Submit a ticket instead."
